sentences.en: 'What ,'said Mr. Cruncher, varying his apostrophe after missing his mark --'what are you , up to, Aggerawayter?'
sentences.cn: “ 你又在玩什么花样, ”克朗彻先生没打中目标, 便改变了问候方式.“又找麻烦是不是? ”

sentences.en: "It's" (with an apostrophe) should be used only as a contraction for "it is".
sentences.cn: it's（带撇号）只能用作itis的缩约形式。

sentences.en: Answer these questions, using the words in parentheses. Put the apostrophe in the right place.
sentences.cn: 用句后括号中的词或词组来回答问题, 注意撇号的位置.

sentences.en: Apostrophe: Sign of omission of letter or to show possessive.
sentences.cn: 省略号: 在英文字内表示略去一些字母或表示拥有的符号.

sentences.en: Do not attempt to one day suddenly turned into a comma or apostrophe.
sentences.cn: 不要企图某一天忽然变成逗号或省略号.

sentences.en: Shoppers passing by don't think: I'm not going to buy them because the apostrophe is misplaced.
sentences.cn: 路过的购物者不会这样想: 我不会去买他的东西,因为那一撇放错了位置.

sentences.en: The apostrophe is not displayed in the cell.
sentences.cn: 撇号在单元格里不显示出来.

sentences.en: The number in this cell is formatted as text or preceded by an apostrophe.
sentences.cn: 此单元格中的数字为文本格式,或者其前面有撇号.

sentences.en: They include Harrods , Selfridges and Currys, who have all excised the apostrophe from their brand names.
sentences.cn: 这些公司包括哈洛兹百货 、 塞弗里吉斯百货及家电商柯瑞斯, 他们都拿掉了品牌名中原有的撇号.

sentences.en: When do I need to use an apostrophe?

words.tran_cn: 省略符号，[计]撇号；呼语，顿呼

trans.tran_cn: 撇号，省略符号，所有格符号，<语>呼语
trans.tran_en: the sign (‘) that is used in writing to show that numbers or letters have been left out, as in ’don’t' (=  do not  ) and '86 (=  1986  )
